detail.description: Precision Wires India Ltd is engaged in manufacturing Enamelled Round and Rectangular Copper Winding Wires, Continuously Transposed Conductor, and Paper / Mica / Nomex Insulated Copper Conductor. The Company primarily supplies to the OEM sector and to various industries like power, auto, consumer durables, transformers, construction etc. It is the largest producer of Winding Wires in South Asia. [1][2][3]
